metadata.name: The Universe is a Sloths imagination #1
metadata.description: If we can now run simulations of the universeâ€¦. soon we could run simulations with consciousness. These simulations will be run millions of times. Chances are we could be in one. Have you ever stopped to think that we could be living in the thought of a sloth? No? Why not! the universe could be within a Zoo thought up by a space faring sloth. This edition is an interesting thought experiment to remind us to be humble.
